name: MathCar
description:
MathCar is a unique and exciting racing game that combines the thrill of competition with the challenge of math education. This cross-platform game can be played on Windows and Linux and allows players to race against themselves or against other players. The twist is that the speed of the car is controlled by solving math problems correctly and quickly.

This game provides an engaging and effective way to improve math fact skills, and the single and multiplayer options give players the flexibility to choose their preferred mode of play. Whether you're looking to improve your math skills or just want a fun and competitive racing game, Mathcar is your speedway to success.

Teachers and home-school parents can use MathCar to supplement traditional math curriculum for kids. It provides a great outlet for children to recognize math as something fun and encourages them to form positive bonds with learning and mathematics.

MathCar is also fun for older students and adults who can use MathCar to sharpen and improve their math skills. It's also just a fun and productive way to compete with your friends and family!

Let us know what features you like and use and what you'd like to see improved in the future! We're excited to hear how MathCar has made a difference for you and how we can make it bigger!
